Package com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.engine

Interface RemotePaymentServiceListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PaymentServiceListener
    public interface RemotePaymentServiceListener
extends PaymentServiceListener
    Listener for the Remote payment payment transaction.
    Since:

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDataReadyForPayment​(PaymentService activatedPaymentService, TransactionContext ctx)
      Once the credentials (for CardHolder verification) has been successfully verified, and Remote payment cryptograms have been successfully generated by CPS SDK, MPA will be informed that RemotePaymentOutputData is available to retrieve.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentServiceListener

    • Method Detail

      • onDataReadyForPayment

        void onDataReadyForPayment​(PaymentService activatedPaymentService,
                           TransactionContext ctx)
        Once the credentials (for CardHolder verification) has been successfully verified, and Remote payment cryptograms have been successfully generated by CPS SDK, MPA will be informed that RemotePaymentOutputData is available to retrieve. Upon reception of the callback, MPA should call PaymentService.getRemotePaymentData() ()} to retrieve the QRCodeData.
        Parameters:
        activatedPaymentService - PaymentService
        ctx - TransactionContext
        Since:
        6.1.0

      • onNextTransactionReady

        default void onNextTransactionReady​(DeactivationStatus deactivationStatus,
                                    DigitalizedCardStatus digitalizedCardStatus,
                                    DigitalizedCard digitalizedCard)
        It is called when payment service deactivation process is finish. Payment service deactivation process will be triggered after Remote payment cryptograms have been successfully generated.
        Parameters:
        deactivationStatus - indicate the status of deactivation process DeactivationStatus
        digitalizedCardStatus - indicate the digital card state DigitalizedCardStatus
        digitalizedCard - indicate the digitalized card DigitalizedCard
        Since:
        6.4.0
